en: ЁЯЩПЁЯП╜Namaste from Khushi Baby, the nodal technical partner of the Department of Health, Medical & Family Welfare, Government of Rajasthan. I am here to assist you with any questions you may have about your work as an ASHA.
You can ask me any question about pregnancy, childcare, and your work as an ASHA, by ЁЯТм typing or sending me a ЁЯОЩя╕Пvoice message. ЁЯШК

en: ЁЯЩПЁЯП╜ Namaste from Khushi Baby, the nodal technical partner of the Department of Health, Medical & Family Welfare, Government of Rajasthan. We are working on a new program to help ASHA workers with their questions.
